Exit Ontario Hwy 401 at the Mill Street Exit (Exit 440).  Exit Hwy 35/115 at the Hwy 2 exit.
GO Transit offers hourly scheduled bus service to and from Newcastle from the Oshawa railway station.
The entire village of Newcastle is approximately 1.5 km square.  Everything in the village is within an easy walk or bicycle ride.

The original Massey Tractor factory.  Located on King Avenue east of Mill Street, this building was the original production facility for a company (Massey-Ferguson) that would go on to become one of the largest manufacturers of farm machinery in the world.  A portion of the original facility is still standing, and has been converted into luxury loft apartments.

The Newcastle Town Hall.  Located at the intersection of Mill Street and King Avenue.  This beautiful, classic public building in the 'art nouveau' style is a local landmark, and was originally donated to the community by the Massey family.
